Instructions:
You have a task for due diligence company, working with solar projects.
As a due diligence manager you will need to build a project preview for th Solar Project.
Preview contains Legal Terms and Short Values.
Legal Terms are the terms that are used in the contract. Direct citations from the contract.
And your task is to extract Short Values from those Leral Terms, so that the preview can be built. And it will be easy for other due diligence managers understand main points of the Legal Terms by looking at the Short Values.

I want you to putput only the Short Values for the Legal Terms. Avoid any unnecessary comments or explanations.
You will be provided with couple of examples for each Legal Term. You will need to extract the Short Value from the Legal Terms in the same format as in the examples.

Then you will need to provide the Short Value for the Legal Terms for tha actual case.
        
        
Retrieve Effective Date from the text in this format:
<example>
Text:
```
3.1- Effective upon execution...
```
Data retrieved:
October 1, 2015</example>


<example>
Text:
```
IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Parties have caused this Agreement to be signed by their respective duly authorized representatives.
...
```
Data retrieved:
August 8, 2019</example>


<example>
Text:
```
1.1	This Agreement shall become effective when executed by both Parties and shall continue in effect until terminated....
```
Data retrieved:
August 16, 2019</example>
Definitions: The date in which the agreement is deemed effective
